title: New Testament Study Guide
description: Designed for the student of God's Word, Pastor Chuck has written a verse-by-verse overview of the New Testament. As you place this book next to your Bible, you'll discover key words that define Greek words commonly used, biblical maps, charts, diagrams and Calvary Chapel distinctives to help you visualize the text. Also included are introductions and study questions for each book of the New Testament.
author: Chuck Smith
